channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Review finds that future vaccine trials must include care home residents
item.description: The first review of vaccine trials conducted in care homes concludes that it is "crucial" that future vaccine trials include care home residents.
